item.description: As part of the CCPD’s Virtual Summer Series, join Consigli Construction virtually on Tuesday, May 27th to learn more about their available internship and co-op opportunities and connect with recruiters. Register in Handshake for more info!

item.title: Collegiate Store Offering 20% - 50% Off During Spring Art Sale
item.description: The Rensselaer Collegiate Store is currently hosting its Spring 2025 Art Sale from now through Saturday, June 28, 2025, with sale items available both in-store and online. While supplies last, customers can save 20% off select art supplies, 40% off select brushes, and 50% off paper and canvas! Note that this sale excludes clearance items, art kits, metals, and jewelry, and cannot be combined with other coupons or discounts.

item.title: Systems Engineering & Technology Management Review with Rensselaer at Work | May 27
item.description: Date: Tuesday, May 27, 2025 7:00 PM - 7:30 PM - This 30-minute information session is hosted by Dean Aric Krause, Ph.D., and will focus on Rensselaer’s Systems Engineering and Technology Management graduate degree. The degree is digitally delivered, flexible, and project-based to prepare decision-makers with broader and deeper capabilities in leading dynamic organizations.
